mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FILE (UUID, UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_NAME, IMAGE, BOARD_BNO, FILE_SIZE) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{image}, #{boardBno}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT UUID, UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_NAME, IMAGE, BOARD_BNO, FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_FILE WHERE UPLOAD_PATH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
